author: Brodigan
description:
Just when you thought we were done with Tim Walz, they pull you back in. His daughter, Hope, has a potty mouth and went on a rant against President Donald Trump. What’s a word that means “dodged a bullet?” NFL Preseason has started, and Travis Kelce hype is already too much. At least we didn’t have to mention Taylor Swift. Aw, dang it. We just did. Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin are meeting in Alaska tomorrow to try to put an end to the Ukraine conflict. Here’s what we think is going down.

HOPE WALZ’ PROFANITY LACED RANT
title: 🔴 Watch! Countdown: Trump and Putin Meeting Preview & Who Wants it to Fail (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
Tucker Carlson slammed Ted Cruz for not knowing the population of Iran. Fine. But Tucker Carlson also let a Hamas apologist go completely unchecked through her propaganda ramblings.

Why?
title: Watch: Tucker Carlson's Falloff Needs to be Studied

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

All of us here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website were anxiously anticipating Trump Admin MVP Tom Homan to have thoughts about the federal takeover of Washington, DC. Lots of fools are making silly comments about it, and Homan isn't known to suffer any of them. He dropped a significant change to law enforcement operations that got lost in arguments about weather DC is very extremely violent or just kinda extremely violent.

You know how Washington DC is a sanctuary city? Not for (at least) the next thirty days!

.
title: Tom Homan announces MAJOR change to Washington DC's status that will lead to more "criminal illegal aliens" being caught

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Take some friendly advice from your Uncle Brodigan. It's 2025. You can't get away with sandwiching a cop in public anymore. Between 2020-2024, then yeah, maybe. But as one schmucklehead in Washington DC learned, it's Donald Trump's America and you FO faster than you FA.

🚨#BREAKING: A DC man has been charged with felony assault charges after hitting a federal agent with Subway sandwich

📌#Washington
title: Man assaults cop with sandwich in Trump's Washington DC, learns the hard way what a "felony" is
